For more information visit ACCC Service and Operations Status       hide      The Academic Multimedia Lab in the IDEA Commons provides faculty and students with resources and support for multimedia production services.  Equipment Lending is available for both faculty and students, including equipment like camcorders, audio recorders, and laptops with media production software pre-installed!  Computers are available in the lab for Multimedia Production , as well as high-quality microphones, headphones, and media production software.  Plus, faculty can check out the Lightboard Studio , an innovative way to record engaging videos.       Google Maps image     Academic Multimedia Lab & Lightboard Studio  Richard J.
